Articles.Content: A while ago, I had decided to switch my KSP account from the website over to steam, however, I clicked on the link to switch, but there happened to be an error, and the link to switch it over is now gone. Help?

I've moved this to support for now, it might end up in the Kerbal Network. The best course of action for errors like this is to contact [email protected] with the email address you used register with the store.
